column1: 1.What function displays row data in a column or column data in a row?#a.Hyperlink#b.Index#c.Transpose#d.Row#c

column2: the data are #a.Hyperlinked#b.Placed in a word table#c.Transpose#d.Embedded#b

column2: you can choose Protection and the Protect Sheet from the .. menu#a.edit#b.format#c.tool#d.data#c
